channel.title: nas on Just a Memo

item.title: Freenas
item.description: Terminal / Console 对普通永户和root此方法都适用 Step one filename: ~/.login_conf me:\ :charset=UTF-8:\ :lang=zh_CN.UTF-8: Step two cd cp .profile .bash_profile 然后再最后添加如下内容: PS1="\e[0;32m[\u@\h:\e[m\e[1;33m\w\e[m\e[0;32m]\e[m " case `id -u` in *) PS1="${PS1}$";; esac alias ls='ls -G'; Jail Errors Metadata corrupt after fetch rm -fr /var/db/portsnap/* portsnap fetch Jail initialize pkg
